body.name: Bevel Deodorant for Men with Coconut Oil and Shea Butter, Aluminum Free, No Streaks, 48 Hour Protection, 2.5 Oz (Packaging May Vary)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 2 hrs 12 mins
features: Quality Ingredients - Our Bevel Deodorant for Men is formulated with nourishing coconut oil and shea butter, providing a gentle and effective solution for odor protection.
48-Hour Protection - With Bevel Deodorant for Men, enjoy long-lasting odor defense. Our formula is designed to provide reliable protection for up to 48 hours, keeping you feeling fresh and confident.
Aluminum Free - Say goodbye to harmful aluminum compounds. Our deodorant is carefully crafted without aluminum, ensuring a safer and healthier choice for your underarm care.

No Streaks, No Residue - Experience the confidence of a deodorant that leaves no streaks or residue on your clothes. Penetrates through coarse and curly hair to keep you staying fresh and clean throughout the day, worry-free.
Convenient Size - Our 2.5 oz deodorant is the perfect travel-friendly companion. Whether you're on-the-go or at the gym, easily carry and apply Bevel deodorant for instant freshness wherever you are.
body.description: Look Ma, no streaks! A deodorant that works as hard as you do. This solid Aluminum-Free deodorant goes on clear, penetrates through coarse/ curly hair, and is proven to fight the funk.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Bevel Difference Designed to help prevent razor bumps, and irritation for smoother, softer skin. Locks in moisture and restores hair strength without stripping hair of its natural oils. Helps reduce bumps, dark spots, and irritation for a fresher, healthier appearance. Moisturizes hair to help strengthen, nourish, and reduce breakage for a fuller beard.

Deodorant Body Wash - Dark Cassis Body Wash - Black Bergamot Body Wash - Supreme Oak Bar Soap Body Lotion Proven 48+ hour odor protection ✓ Lightweight formula quickly absorbs into skin ✓ Skin becomes softer, smoother, and more resistant to dryness ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Get that fresh, clean feeling ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Deeply nourishes skin for all-day moisture ✓ Exfoliates to reveal hydrated skin ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Creates rich, luxurious lather to cleanse skin ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Available in 3 signature scents ✓ ✓ ✓ For all skin types ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: According to my Amazon history, I’ve been using this deodorant for about a year now and this is the best deodorant I’ve ever used. The fragrance is mild but fresh smelling and I never have body odor, even if I have been sweating like crazy. I also like that it doesn’t have aluminum in it. I wish they would bring back the original color scheme of dark brown and taupe cause the off white design just looks like so many other products on the market IMO. I will continue using the body lotion and face wash, as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The smell I should checked lol
reviews.reviewText: The smell as for the deodorant itself it works perfectly nice and smooth on texture problem is it smells like cheap dollar store bought deodorant but it will do

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Deodorant with Some Limitations
reviews.reviewText: This is a great deodorant but there are a few caveats that one should know before purchasing. First, this product leans more towards a deodorant than an anti-perspirant. It works OK as an anti-perspirant but if you are a very heavy sweater, one application will not be enough for a full day. Second, this does not mask body odor. This is not a product to use if you had to skip a shower and needed something to get you through the day. Tossing this on already desperate pits will just make your BO smell flowery. Third, I had some staining on shirts when I first switched but that has disappeared. I do not know if the initial stains were due to me adapting to a new deodorant or if they changed the formula.If those three things are non issues for you, this is a wonderful deo with a smell that is good but remains neutral. It can be overpowering if you apply too much but that's normal. It also does a great job with thick hair and doesn't just tack on top of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Transitioning from my usual Dove deodorant, I decided to give Bevel Deodorant for Men with Coconut Oil and Shea Butter a try, and it has exceeded my expectations in every aspect. If you're seeking a natural alternative with a unique and refreshing touch, this deodorant is a standout choice.The scent is one of its standout features—pleasant, distinctive, and long-lasting. It not only keeps me feeling fresh throughout the day but also adds a unique and enjoyable fragrance that sets it apart from conventional deodorants.The incorporation of coconut oil and shea butter provides a smooth and nourishing feel, making it gentle on the skin. Knowing that it's aluminum-free adds to the appeal, giving me confidence that I'm making a healthier choice for my body.What impressed me the most is the long-lasting effectiveness. The 48-hour protection claim holds true, and I appreciate not having to reapply frequently. This makes it an ideal choice for those busy days when I need reliable and enduring freshness.In conclusion, Bevel Deodorant for Men has successfully won me over with its natural ingredients, unique scent, and long-lasting performance. I highly recommend it to anyone looking to make the switch to a quality natural brand that stands out from the rest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fine deodorant but stains certain clothes and expensive for how long it lasts
reviews.reviewText: The deodorant worked fine for me if you wanted a natural, unscented deodorant. However, the oil in the product would stain certain shirts of mine. Also I would blow through a stick in less than a month which is much quicker than other deodorants I have used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Too Overpriced and Too Ineffective
reviews.reviewText: Pros:Has a ginger and slight oatmeal smell that is very light and would be perfect for people that prefer a light or unscented deodorant.Goes on very smoothCons:This is way too expensive for how little how have versus how fast it goes.The directions say to place a thin layer on but if you prefer to smell your scents on yourself, you'll need to use a little more, which in turn makes it run out faster. And trust me you will want to use more because it leads into my final con:Very ineffective. You can either follow the directions and place a thin layer or you can do you and put on however much you want, it doesn't matter. This stuff barely lasts an hour before you don't even smell like anything under your arms and not too long after that you'll start to even smell bad. Which is laughable considering it says right on the bottle it lasts 48 hours. Even if you dumped the whole roll on would it not last longer than 3 hours tops.Waste of money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expensive but nice
reviews.reviewText: I bought this deodorant just to try it, given that the price is so high compared to what I normally wear (old spice and Tom’s). To my surprise, I like the smell and product so much that I’ll probably purchase it again even though it’s pricy. It is not unscented, but the smell is very nice and subtle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It would be perfect without the smell. It smells like old pine.
